infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Wingman needs your location to find companions near you and auto-fill your location during signup.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Wingman needs access to your photo library so you can send images and videos in encrypted chats.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Wingman needs permission to save selected media for secure encrypted uploads.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Wingman needs camera access so you can capture images and videos in encrypted chats.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Wingman needs microphone access when you record video messages.
